pages.title: Crusher Spirits
pages.text: Crusher spirits are summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively multiplying the metal output. They will pick up appropriate ores and drop the resulting dusts into the world. A purple particle effect and a crushing sound indicate the crusher is at work.

To ease automation, try summoning a $(l:rituals/summoning/summon_transport_items)Transporter Spirit$(/l) to place items from chests in the crusher's inventory, and a $(l:rituals/summoning/summon_cleaner)Janitor Spirit$(/l) to collect the processed items.

pages.title: Foliot Crusher
pages.text: The foliot crusher is the most basic crusher spirit.

pages.title: Djinni Crusher
pages.text: The djinni crusher is both more resistant to essence decay and faster than the foliot crusher.

pages.title: Afrit Crusher
pages.text: The afrit crusher is both more resistant to essence decay and faster than the djinni crusher.

pages.title: Marid Crusher
pages.text: The marid crusher is both more resistant to essence decay and faster than the afrit crusher.
